channel.title: Doors Trouble
channel.description:
I've looked at this tutorial: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/256622-317-adding-working-doors.html][b][317]Adding Working Doors[317][/b][/url]
I've got this in my [b]Doors.Cfg[/b] [code=java]door = 3226 3214 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0 door = 3226 3223 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0[/code]
That opens the 2 doors at Lumbridge, But when the door is clicked it doesn't actually open the door. It doesn't even allow you to walk through. I've read through [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/256622-317-adding-working-doors.html][b]This[/b][/url] Throughly and it still doesn't open the door. Can i please have some help.

item.title: Doors Trouble
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

The linked worked like 2 days ago, Hmm. I’m not sure why it isn’t working, But i have a Delta.

Read full topic

the link doesnt open.

item.title: Doors Trouble
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

I’ve looked at this tutorial: [317]Adding Working Doors[317]

I’ve got this in my Doors.Cfg

door = 3226 3214 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0 door = 3226 3223 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0

That opens the 2 doors at Lumbridge, But when the door is clicked it doesn’t actually open the door. It doesn’t even allow you to walk through. I’ve read through This Throughly and it still doesn’t open the door. Can i please have some help.

Read full topic
